column1: Switzerland got off to a successful start in Group G with Embolo scoring the only goal of the game. Xhaka initiated the move
column2: sending the ball to Shaqiri who then found Embolo in the box. Unmarked
column3: the striker fired the ball past Onana who had no chance of stopping it. Vargas had a chance to double Switzerland's lead
column4: but Onana was able to push the shot wide. Cameroon had their own opportunities to score in the first half
column5: with Mbeumo and Hongla both having shots on goal that were saved by Sommer.
